bibdata.title: IEEE Trial-Use Recommended Practice for the Preparation and Use of Symbols
IEEE Trial-Use Recommended Practice for the Preparation and Use of Symbols

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Guidelines to be used in developing and applying those symbols that are employed in the electrical and electronics fields are provided. These include abbreviations, functional designations, graphic symbols, letter combinations, mathematical symbols, reference designations, symbols for quantities, and symbols for units. The guidelines should be useful to any committee engaged in developing standards publications in the areas mentioned.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
